statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ 22 \\ -9 \\ 10 \\ 11 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
